description: Video start event, fired when the player is ready to play for the first time.

vsid.description: Video session ID, unique to a specific video session.

ts.description: UNIX timestamp of the current event.

prevTs.description: UNIX timestamp of the previous event.

state.description: The current state of the player. This can be either playing or paused.

currentTime.description: The current playhead position of the player in seconds.

playbackRate.description: The playback speed of the content. The default value is 1.
